## Prepare Battery

*Step 1:* Connect the green male wire (notch aligned) to green port on the battery. \
*Step 2:* Do the same for the red wire and port on amplifier.

::: {.callout-tip title="REMINDER"}
**The battery must stay pluged in all the time when not in use.**
:::

## Power on the Task Laptop and EEG Tower

*Step 1:* Log into the Admin account on the EEG Tower and task laptop (password: 4073abc).\
*Step 2:* On the Tower: Launch BrainVision Recorder (click “Yes” when prompted).\
*Step 3:* When the program is open, you should see a gray screen.

## Prepare EEG Gel Syringes

The syringes are stored under the sink inside boxes. \
The gel tub, tips box, Q-tips, scissors, and tissues are kept on the shelf next to the sink.

::: {layout-ncol="2" title="Where to Find the Tools"}

![Boxes of Syringes](../../images/2-before-testing/29.jpg){width=50% fig-align="left"}

![Gel tub, Tips box, Q-tips, Scissors & Tissues](../../images/2-before-testing/30.jpg){width=80% fig-align="left"}
:::


*Step 1:* Take out the syringes and the tips from their packaging. \
*Step 2:* Fill two syringes with gel.\
*Step 3:* Close the gel tub immediately to prevent drying.\
*Step 4:* Attach the tips to the filled syringes.\
*Step 5:* Cut one of the Q-tips ends with the scissors.\
*Step 6:* Place two tissues and two Q-tips on the cabin bed in preparation for the participant.
